Reviews.Title: Not as good as advertised...
Reviews.Author: Alex and Sarah
Reviews.Content: I had a Samsung L73 before. A pretty good point and shoot camera for it's time.So I decided to get other Samsung camera to replace it and based on described features I thought it would be an awesome price/quality deal. But the camera it's kinda a disappointment, specially for indoor and low light situations. Also, the optical image stabilization isn't that good and I keep getting blurry photos almost all time. So 3 stars for this camera is enough...

Reviews.Title: Would not buy again.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The photo quality was very bad. I ended up buying a Canon PowerShot 330 which is so much better in almost every aspect except the zoom.

Reviews.Title: rate
Reviews.Author: gary moore
Reviews.Content: This was my first camera purchased in years. It exceeded my expectations. It took amazing pictures of my vacation in Vegas. And also allowed me take videos of my grandchildren. A feature I didn't I had. I love this camera

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: J. Simon
Reviews.Content: Pictures are Fantastic. Best little camera I've had in years. I will stick with Samsung forever if this is their usual quality. I've had every type from Kodak to Nikon and I would take this camera over all of them.

ProductInfo.Features:
16 megapixel resolution with high-quality still images and video recordings
Samsung 4.85-48.5mm zoom lens with 10x optical zoom, Optical Image Stabilization
3.0" TFT Intelligent  LCD screen with image editing features, Live Panorama
Built-in flash with Red-Eye Reduction, Fill-In Flash, Auto On/Off and Slow-Sync Flash
16MB built-in memory with 1 microSD/SDHC/SDXC memory card slot (memory card not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST200 Non Wi-Fi Compact Camera - Black (16MP, 10x Optical Zoom) 3 inch LCD Screen
